programme.title: Lost You Forever - EP 9
programme.desc: The world of Dahuang was once divided into three kingdoms: Xiyan, Chenrong, and Haoling. Xiyan and Chenrong were at war, and General Chi Chen led the forces of Chenrong. At the last minute, the daughter of Xiyan's Emperor was called on to lead Xiyan's forces as the General Princess. She defeated General Chi Chen at the cost of her own life, and succeeded in turning the tide of the war. Chenrong lost its momentum and was conquered by Xiyan.

programme.title: Super Taste - 2 Days 1 Night Go S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: This series will bring viewers to more interesting places in Seoul, Busan, Osaka, Tokyo, Malaysia, Croatia etc.

programme.title: Your Hand In Mine - EP 8
programme.desc: Using the local society issues as a backbone, this drama depicts the lives of families of different background residing in the same neighbourhood, from the cold and self-centered to the understanding of the true meaning of love. programme.title: The Heartland Hero - EP 81

programme.title: SSTTT SI PALING MOTORAN GAK DIAJAK
programme.desc: Rara is a motorcycle gang member who is inaugurating a motorcycle club in Puncak but there is an incident where Dudung's goat escapes and Rara becomes Amnesia, on that occasion Dudung tries to bring Rara home, utilizing her to sell and graze goats, but over time feelings for each other arise and fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 343
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Rekayasa Cinta Dokter Cantik No Play Play
programme.desc: Angel (Zoe Abbas), who is constantly pressured by her mother to get married, finally takes the practical route by claiming to be the lover of her patient who suffers from amnesia. Angel's two best friends don't agree with her idea, but they end up supporting her. Angel says she will soon marry the man whose real name is Marcel (Bryan McKenzie) because Angel claims to be Marcel's fiancée before Marcel has amnesia.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 329
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 3
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: BIDUAN GEROBAK DANGDUT TRENDING
programme.desc: Mira, a beautiful woman from Kampung Dangdut, works as a "ngangon goat" worker. Feeling talented in singing dangdut, Mira auditioned to sing dangdut in her village, even though the pungent smell of goats on her body was not a barrier to auditioning. However, her father did not approve, even though Mira had a very melodious voice. How would Mira continue her talent as a dangdut singer despite her goat odor? Will she continue to "ngangon kambing"?

programme.title: Movie - Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu - EP 1
programme.desc: Aravind (Bharath) loses his girl friend Liyana (Mirthika) in a car accident and he lives with her memories. But, people around him try to make him believe that he is just hallucinating and no such person existed. The rest of the story shows whether he has been hallucinating about a non-existed girl friend or if there was really one.

programme.title: Movie - Sabari
programme.desc: Sabarivasan, a cardiologist, works in a government hospital during the day and runs a clinic at night. He attracts the enmity of a local goon when he gets the goon's partner arrested.

programme.title: Movie - Bhadra
programme.desc: An unknown disease kills many people in a village; however, according to a prediction, someone will come to help them. When one of the villagers meets Raju, he realises that Raju is the one who can save them.

programme.title: Movie - Naan Chootiya Malar
programme.desc: This movie stars Vijayakanth and Subhadra, and is directed by C S Govindaraja.

programme.title: Movie - Ninaivil Nindraval
programme.desc: A young tourist at a hill station falls in love with her tour guide. When she learns that he was wrongly implicated in a murder case, she tries to help him prove his innocence.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Anbulla Kamal
programme.desc: Roy, Soorya, Amir and Gauri, four individuals who suffer from a terminal disease, become friends. They embark on a journey to meet Soorya's girlfriend and gain a positive outlook on life.

programme.title: Movie - Mirugam
programme.desc: Ayyanar is a womanising, savage man who beats up innocents and rapes women. He marries the pretty Alagamma who at first hates him, but later decides to transform him. But, his sinful past soon catches up.

programme.title: Movie - Makkal En Pakkam
programme.desc: Childhood friends Samraj and Rajmohan become enemies after Samraj is falsely accused of theft. When Samraj becomes a smuggler, he constantly faces problems due to Rajmohan's political influence.

programme.title: Movie - Ranuva Veeran
programme.desc: Raghu returns to his village and learns that people are being terrorised by a notorious gang. His world comes crashing down when he realises that his sister is in love with the leader of the gang.

programme.title: Movie - Hero
programme.desc: Shakthi, a young man, helps Mathi, a student, exhibit her invention at an educational fair. However, when they both are falsely accused of a patent violation, he sets out to prove their innocence.

programme.title: Movie - James Bond
programme.desc: James and Pandu are porters and very good friends. They get appointed by the owner and the manager of a chit fund to steal money, but later fall into a trap.

programme.title: Movie - Saathikku Oru Neethi
programme.desc: Saathikku Oru Neethi is a 1981 Tamil-language action film directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar, starring Vijayakanth and Swapna in lead roles. The film had musical score by Sankar Ganesh.

programme.title: Movie - Iniyallam Sugame
programme.desc: Arvind and Nandini meet in a singing competition and instantly fall in love with each other. Their lives take a turn when his friend Nirmala develops feelings for him.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Archana IAS
programme.desc: A widow brings up her daughter Archana by being a strict mother. The girl succeeds in passing the IAS exams and becomes a collector to take revenge on the man who cheated her mother.

programme.title: Movie - Vanga Partner Vanga
programme.desc: Three villagers go to Chennai to become rich and promise Lord Ganapathi a quarter of their profit if he becomes their partner. However, when the time comes for them to pay him, they refuse to do so.

programme.title: Movie - Mouna Geethangal
programme.desc: A woman divorces her husband after she learns of his illicit affair. When she discovers that she is pregnant, she moves to a new town to start life afresh. Ten years later, they meet again.

programme.title: Movie - Idhayam
programme.desc: A medical student from a small town falls in love with one of his classmates. However, a series of circumstances combined with his own shyness keep him from expressing his feelings to her.

programme.title: Movie - Zombie
programme.desc: Tired of their day-to-day lives, three friends decide to go on a vacation where they encounter zombies and meet a girl while running for their lives.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Volta a Catalunya is a road bicycle race held annually in Catalonia, Spain. It is one of three World Tour stage races in Spain, together with the Vuelta a España and the Tour of the Basque Country. Raced over seven days, it covers the autonomous community of Catalonia in Northeast Spain and contains one or more stages in the mountain region of the Pyrenees. First held in 1911, the Volta a Catalunya is the fourth-oldest still-existing cycling stage race in the world.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group F: Netherlands vs Germany
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025: R2-21 (John Higgins vs Xiao Guodong)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: Women’s tennis has been a mainstay of Eastbourne since 1974’s inaugural Eastbourne Open. The tournament is played on outdoor grass courts, and is generally considered a "warm-up" for the Wimbledon Championships. Some of the world's finest female tennis talent will head to Devonshire Park to compete for the prize purse of USD$142,000. Martina Navratilova holds the record for the most singles titles with 11

programme.title: World Cup of Darts 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Cup of Darts is the 15th edition of the PDC World Cup of Darts and it is staged by the Professional Darts Corporation. It will take place at the Eissporthalle in Frankfurt, Germany. The tournament consists of 40 teams and the total prize money is to remain at £450,000.

programme.title: Heroines 2025
programme.desc: Heroines is a new, timeless series, that tables important discussion that challenges the status quo and celebrates the unique values of women’s sport. Each episode features a dedicated theme such as equality, maternity, leadership, mental health, fan engagement, activism and more, supported by exclusive interviews with leaders at the forefront of women’s sport.

programme.title: World Cup of Darts 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Cup of Darts is the 15th edition of the PDC World Cup of Darts and it is staged by the Professional Darts Corporation. It will take place at the Eissporthalle in Frankfurt, Germany. The tournament consists of 40 teams and the total prize money is to remain at £450,000.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2025
programme.desc: Mass participation sports events are commonly associated with large participation numbers, usually in the tens of thousands. From traditional events such as marathons, triathlons and cycling events to the newer formats of obstacle races such as Spartan Race and themed events like Hello Kitty Run and The Color Run, these races are regularly attracting participants en masse.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group F: Germany vs Great Britain
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: Eschborn-Frankfurt is an annual semi classic cycling race in Germany, starting in Eschborn and finishing in Frankfurt. The event, sometimes referred to as the Frankfurt Grand Prix, is held annually on 1 May, national Labour Day in Germany. The event was first held on 1 May 1962. The race passes through the Taunus Hills west of Frankfurt, along a winding and hilly course with around 1500m (5,000 feet) of climbing.

programme.title: Badminton Unlimited 2025
programme.desc: Catch all the happenings in and around the world of badminton here on the show Badminton Unlimited.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Presidential Cycling Tour of Turkey is a professional road bicycle racing stage race held annually in Turkey since 1963. 2025 will be the 60th edition and it will host 23 teams on its historical course . 161 cyclists will compete on the heavenly roads of Türkiye for 8 days, 8 stages, 1,153 km from the Mediterranean to the Aegean.

programme.desc: The Italian Open is the men's national open golf championship of Italy. It was founded in 1925. programme.title: UNDER THE SKIN: NOTTINGHAM FOREST
programme.desc: This documentary celebrates the incredible, rollercoaster ride of Nottingham Forest Showcasing the club's fans, culture and traditions, we see how Forest's return to European football was achieved by reconnecting with the legacy of Brian Clough.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 50
programme.desc: We follow New Zealand striker Chris Wood during a crucial World Cup Qualifier on home soil, at the peak of one of the most impressive seasons of his career. Back in his hometown, we meet the family, coaches and friends who helped shape the player and the person he's become. From humble beginnings to Premier League mainstay, Wood reflects on the pressures he's faced, the pride of leading his country, and the mindset that's driven him every step of the way.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2010/2011 season.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode features part 2 of all the highlights from BodogFIGHT season two showing recaps and highlights of all the MMA scraps that took place in St. Petersburg, Russia.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Tbilisi, Georgia, where judo is one of the most popular sports in the country.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Asanoyama, Daieisho, Terunofuji and Shodai.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Weapons Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last season's Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. Seren Cetin
programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender and undefeated challenger Seren Cetin of Turkey. Thorslund has held World Championship gold for over five years, including seven defenses of the WBO World Title before adding the WBC Championship in September.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship as well as Boys Forms, Synchronized Team Weapons and a World Record Break.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Prix from Antalya, speak with Lukas Krpalek about his move to +100 kg weight class, and get a demonstration on how to preform the popular ride and roll counter attack.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Erik Morales vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is an interim WBA light welterweight title fight between Erik Morales and Marcos Maidana that gave Maidana a chance to leap back into the boxing title scene, while Morales provided fans with a vintage performance. Also on the card, action from WBO welterweight champ Carlos Quintanta.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Terunofuji, Asanoyama, Takayasu and Wakatakakage.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. We head inside the kitchen of one of MMA's leading nutritionists, Mike Dolce, to find out what are the approved foods in the Dolce Diet. Melvin Guillard summons his inner daredevil and jumps off the Stratosphere in Las Vegas, plus much more.

programme.title: NRL Dolphins v Rabbitohs

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 116
programme.desc: It's Teletubby Circus time! Tinky Winky balances on the tight rope, Dipsy juggles, Laa-Laa flies on the trapeze and Po is a funny clown.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 22
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'v', and they go on an adventure around the sound. We see a van and a volcano, and meet a violet violin!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: As it's rainy, Phoebe decides to play hotel - will the game go as well as she hopes?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Lofty's giant sneezes go a long way, so Messy and his friends must help to wash OKIDO clean of all the bad germs flying around!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 26
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: The Go Jetters spring into action when Glitch's mini-master toys invade Hong Kong Harbour.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 18
programme.desc: When a waved albatross snatches Mr Hammond's pocket bird guide book from Jen, it's up to Andy to find it and bring it home.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Charli loses her phone at the toy shop. Can Tinks' super-fetch skills help her find it?

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 16
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals: this time it's the tamarin and crowned pigeon. Their wild connection is that they both have fancy "hairdos".

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 12
programme.desc: Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed get a new 'Smart Parrot' to help make life easier around the Scarlet Squid. Unfortunately it only ends up making life harder for the pirates!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels think about life's big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 11
programme.desc: Sonny returns to Sodor to try to be a really useful engine again but some of the other trains aren't willing to give him a second chance.

programme.desc: Scarf Lady introduces Sarah and Duck to a new game involving knitted sporting equipment.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Duck keeps oversleeping, so Sarah decides he needs his own alarm clock.

programme.desc: Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Stanley and the children tour the museum and quickly realise there's nothing about them or their friends, so they make a new exhibit all about their town today!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: When Jimmy Jones is too scared of monsters to go under the bed to fetch a ball, Monty tells him that there's nothing to worry about and wonders, even if monsters really did live under the bed, how they could be sure they would even be scary.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 39

programme.desc: When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.desc: The Squirrels go out for a walk but can't find a way back to the clubhouse.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. As it crystallises, it rips the bricks, mortar and stone to shreds. The city is crumbling. Venice's very existence is hanging in the balance. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia S1 - EP 4

programme.desc: Heywire winner Miranda, a proud palawa woman, reflects on her ancestors resistance and survival and how they kept their culture and language alive.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: A little Melbourne workers' cottage gets a radical reimagining as a Mid Century Palm Springs oasis, while across town, a backyard shed is transformed into a Japanese bathhouse.

programme.title: This Place (2019) - EP 40
programme.desc: Wangal people know Sydney as the place of eel Dreaming and before it was known as the Parramatta River, the waterway was called Burramattagal. Join Uncle Jimmy Smith on a tour of Sydney's significant parks and waterways.

programme.title: What Happens Later
programme.desc: Two ex-lovers, Bill and Willa, get snowed in at a regional airport overnight. Indefinitely delayed, Willa, a magical thinker, and Bill, a catastrophic one, find themselves just as attracted to and annoyed by one another as they did decades earlier. But as they unpack the riddle of their mutual past and compare their lives to the dreams they once shared, they begin to wonder if their reunion is mere coincidence, or something more enchanted.

programme.title: She Came To Me
programme.desc: A multi-generational love story set against the iconic backdrop of New York.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Forced into rehab, Morris agrees to coach a misfit softball team of recovering addicts to prove that everyone, despite their past, can hit a home run.

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse Of The Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit race to prevent a monstrous herbivore from chomping down on the town’s vegetable harvest before their annual vegetable competition.

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: An internet coder is sent to test and evaluate the capabilities and consciousness of his CEO’s experiment in artificial intelligence.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1 - EP 1123
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Round And Round
programme.desc: Rachel’s stuck in a time loop, reliving the night of her parents’ Hanukkah party. Can Zach, the "nice boy" Grandma’s trying to set her up with, help her make it to tomorrow?

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: An optimistic koala puts on the world’s biggest singing competition to save his crumbling theatre in this animated comedy about finding music that lives inside all of us.

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: After being abandoned at the altar by his sweetheart, wedding singer Adam Sandler is jaded by love until he meets a waitress played by Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Celebrate the life of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love, peace, and unity. In this uplifting film, discover Bob Marley's story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music that changed the world.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A spectacular retelling of The Iliad, Troy is an epic tale of passion, heroism, betrayal and war.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan is spirited away to a magical land, where he finds both fun and dangers, and discovers his destiny - to become the hero who will be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's masterpiece follows a team of scientists on an island to witness real dinosaurs in a park, only to see everything go wrong when a storm hits.

programme.title: Self Reliance
programme.desc: Given the opportunity to participate in a life or death reality game show, one man discovers there's a lot to live for.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: The Bikeriders chronicles the story of The Vandals, a fictional motorcycle club that transforms into a more sinister gang over the course of a decade.

programme.title: Oppenheimer
programme.desc: Christopher Nolan's biographical drama about brilliant physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer’s role in the development of the atomic bomb.

programme.title: Lego Jurassic Park: The Unofficial Retelling
programme.desc: The ever charming and now slightly older Chaos Mathematician Dr. Ian Malcolm retells the tale of what happened that dreadful night at Jurassic Park.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry moves into the best hotel in New York on the eve of the wedding of the century, the event planner hires Tom to get rid of him. However, the ensuing cat and mouse battle threatens to destroy her career, the wedding and possibly the hotel.

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: After being abandoned at the altar by his sweetheart, wedding singer Adam Sandler is jaded by love until he meets a waitress played by Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: An optimistic koala puts on the world’s biggest singing competition to save his crumbling theatre in this animated comedy about finding music that lives inside all of us.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Jack Black is Po, the unlikely hero chosen to fulfill an ancient kung fu prophecy in this delightful animation voiced by a star-studded cast.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan is spirited away to a magical land, where he finds both fun and dangers, and discovers his destiny - to become the hero who will be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: Self Reliance
programme.desc: Given the opportunity to participate in a life or death reality game show, one man discovers there's a lot to live for.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's masterpiece follows a team of scientists on an island to witness real dinosaurs in a park, only to see everything go wrong when a storm hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Meryl Streep stars in this well-loved musical which follows a girl as she invites three men to her wedding, one of whom she suspects to be her father.

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: An epic action-adventure with a breathtaking new vision of the legendary tale of Snow White.

programme.title: Peacemaker S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Peacemaker meets his new team in the series premiere.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: The gothic fable follows a young woman who is being haunted by an ancient Transylvanian vampire, bringing untold horror with him.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: In this new take on the tragic love story, a seasoned musician discovers and falls in love with a struggling artiste.

programme.title: What's My Name: Muhammad Ali S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: One of the most iconic figures in athletic history, Muhammad Ali's incredible story from world champion boxer to inspiring social activist is explored through his own voice and never-before-seen archival material.

programme.title: Freediver
programme.desc: Freediving champion Alexey Molchanov sets out on a daring mission to break five world records.

programme.title: Euphoria S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Rue gets depressed. Jules goes to visit an old friend. Cassie looks for advise in the aftermath of Halloween night.

programme.title: The Insurrectionist Next Door
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi turns her camera on some of the individuals who stormed the U.S. Capitol on January 6, 2021.

programme.title: Something The Lord Made
programme.desc: In this HBO Original movie, two men achieve an enormous medical breakthrough that earns one an award and the other, a painful lesson in unequal opportunity.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: In this new take on the tragic love story, a seasoned musician discovers and falls in love with a struggling artiste.

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: An unlikely love triangle teaches three individuals the value of love and life.

programme.title: Recount
programme.desc: A look at the 2000 Presidential Election following the Florida recount from election day through the Supreme Court's ruling in favor of G. W. Bush.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Three generations of the Deetz family return home to Winter River. Lydia's teenage daughter, Astrid, discovers the model of the town in the attic and the portal to the Afterlife is opened.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1 - EP 1121
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: There’s Something Wrong With Aunt Diane
programme.desc: An HBO documentary that investigates the mysterious tragedy of Diane Schuler in an effort to understand what went wrong.

programme.title: In Pursuit Of Honor
programme.desc: Don Johnson leads a group of men in the fight to save the cavalry's last horses from slaughter.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Chinese-American New Yorker Rachel Chu travels to Singapore with her boyfriend Nick to attend his best friend's wedding. Before long, his secret is out: Nick's family is wealthy, and he's considered the most eligible bachelor in Asia…

programme.title: The Gilded Age S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: Young Marian Brook moves from rural Pennsylvania into the New York City home of her old money aunts and gets enmeshed in a Gilded Age social war with their rich neighbours.

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: A diplomat is shattered when his young wife is mysteriously and brutally murdered. Digging deeper, he finds himself entangled in a series of cover-ups.

programme.title: The Curse Of La Llorona

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies. Accompany each lives with pleasure and joy every single day. Eat Around Indonesia takes people to taste delicious foods around Indonesia. Indonesian famous culinary will be known even wider.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Tough Trains

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. programme.title: Go Go Sister - EP 1
programme.desc: We search for the best ingredients from all over the world, use the skills of Michelin star chefs to make delicious and touching dishes, and deliver them warmly to your home.

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1388
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 530
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Dee Girl's Talk - EP 294
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - EP 1735
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: Eat,Play,Love - EP 7
programme.desc: We invite you to eat all over Taiwan, let the "cuisine" move you and me, and make "travel" more meaningful.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1065
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. programme.title: Kangsi Coming
programme.desc: Lead by Kevin Tsai and Dee Hsu, who never fail to entertain their audience by the fast-paced, humorous and fully self-aware hosting style. programme.title: Super Followers

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 6
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 25
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 16
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 1
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 10
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 1
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 10
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 7
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: The Stew of Life - EP 1
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 17
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 15
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Anna in Kungfu-Land
programme.desc: An advertising executive, Kin, launches a martial arts tournament as an advertising campaign for his client. He travels to Japan to invite Shaolin descendant, Anna, to join the tournament. This results in attracting the eccentric masters of other eight sects to join too. As the tournament approaches, Kin and Anna unconsciously fall for each other...

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of "Infernal Affairs" are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men's help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun's warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: Huan Zhu's ghost seeks help from "Fake Ghost Catchers" Bao Tuo and Zhou Peng, after a jealous suitor's ghost seeks vengeance by murdering her and now targeting her sister. Together with actor Wu Shun Chao who possesses a supernatural talent, they unite to protect Huan Zhu's sister from both mortal and spectral threats.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the 'Flying Guillotine Squad', a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called "The Venoms", and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls' high school, is stuck with a baby that isn't his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui's embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love...

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.desc: Yoon Gyeo Rye lived at an orphanage, spent time in prison, and now struggles to lead a normal life. He volunteers at a hospice, where he works alongside volunteer team leader Kang Tae Sik and nurse Seo Yeon Joo. Despite his dark past and aggressive attitude, he unknowingly seeks comfort.

programme.title: Si Jin - EP 39
programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: The Legend of Young Justice Bao - EP 25
programme.desc: The story tells about various bizarre mysteries such as "Blood Soul Forest", "Pouling Town", and "Ghost Valley" that Bao Zheng experienced in his youth on his way to Beijing to rush to the exam.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 657
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.
